ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: How do you feel?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am in total agreement with Su here. Back before the nerf of KEI and other group buff spells not meant to be cast on the younger players you could have almost
ygData.messageBody:
I am in total agreement with Su here. Back before the nerf of KEI and other group buff spells not meant to be cast on the younger players you could have almost endless mana as a younger player and that was definitely not how the game was designed.  I mean I would just log in my high lvl mage group with a newly made char on my other acct cast a 45 point damage shield on the lvl 1 character and be lvl 30 with in a matter of hours,  after that with KEI and other PL'ing tools I could make lvl 50 with in a couple of days, I think PL'ing in it self is much to powerful of a tool right now, I do power level my characters on occasion but I wish they could find a way to tone that power down it makes the game a bit to easy.  Good Luck with the letter, and if you do quit, I shall say we'll probably see you back in the game in a few months.
 
Nak
